metadata.projectGoal: Mountain Goats 网页版桌游 - 2-4人本地Hotseat模式

setup.project-init.description: Initialize Vue3 + TypeScript + TailwindCSS + Shadcn project structure

core.game-state.description: Define game state model (mountains, tokens, players, goats, dice)

core.game-rules.description: Implement core game rules engine (dice grouping, movement, scoring)

core.turn-flow.description: Implement turn flow logic (roll, group, move, bonus check, end turn)

core.end-game.description: Implement end game detection and scoring with tiebreakers

ui.game-setup.description: Create game setup screen (2-4 players, names, colors)

ui.mountains.description: Render 6 mountains with paths, goat positions, and token piles

ui.dice-area.description: Create dice rolling area with grouping interaction

ui.player-panel.description: Display player list with scores, tokens, and current turn indicator

ui.dice-roll-animation.description: Add dice rolling animation and result display

ui.goat-movement.description: Animate goat movement and knockoff effects

ui.multiple-ones.description: UI for changing extra 1s to other values

ui.grouping-interaction.description: Drag/click dice grouping with real-time sum display

ui.end-game-screen.description: End game results screen with scores, rankings, and replay button
